text: Hi everyone! I’m Chia-Yu at Max Planck Institute for Extraterrestrial Physics (MPE) working on hydrodynamical simulations and ISM chemistry (any simulators here?). I recently released a chemistry code: <https://github.com/huchiayu/AstroChemistry.jl> which performs PDR calculations with user-defined chemistry networks (using the UMIST database). It can be used in simple one-zone models as well as post-processing hydro simulations in 3D. Questions and feedback are most welcome :slightly_smiling_face:
